original_text: But Hannah did not go as well. She said to her husband, ‘I will not go until the boy is older. When he can eat proper food, I will take him to Shiloh to give him to the Lord. Then he will live there for all his life.’
korean_text: 오직 한나는 올라가지 아니하고 그의 남편에게 이르되 아이를 젖 떼거든 내가 그를 데리고 가서 여호와 앞에 뵙게 하고 거기에 영원히 있게 하리이다 하니

sentences.original_text: But Hannah did not go as well
I will not go until the boy is older
sentences.korean_translation: 아이가 더 자랄 때까지 가지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: When he can eat proper food
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 제대로 된 음식을 먹을 수 있을 때

sentences.original_text: I will take him to Shiloh
to give him to the Lord
